messages.content: can you tell me all the names of Thoth

Thoth is the god of knowledge and writing in ancient egypt. the ancient egyptians knew him by the name of THOTH. he is also the uncle of pharaohs. Thoth is depicted as a man with a book and an ibis head. he is known to have an ibis head because it is a symbol of knowledge and writing. the ancient egyptians considered him the god of knowledge and writing.

you can pronounce Thoth as TOO’ or TOOHE’
